content:
What a thoughtful gesture! Getting books that align with your grandma's reading style and interests will surely make her feel special. Since you've already got her a book by her favorite author, I'll suggest some genres and authors that might appeal to her tastes:

**Cozy Mystery:**

* Agatha Christie's Miss Marple series or Poirot series
* Alexander McCall Smith's The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency series
* M.C. Beaton's Agatha Raisin series

**Historical Fiction:**

* Kristin Hannah's The Nightingale or The Great Alone
* Paula McLain's The Paris Wife or Circling the Sun
* Barbara Taylor Bradford's A Woman of Substance or Hold the Dream

**Women's Fiction:**

* Debbie Macomber's A Turn in the Road or Last One Home
* Susan Wiggs' The Apple Orchard or The Beekeeper's Ball
* Robyn Carr's Four Friends or The Summer That Made Us

**Romance:**

* Nora Roberts' The Bride Quartet or The Inn BoonsBoro Trilogy
* Jude Deveraux's A Holiday of Love or The Girl from Summer Hill
* Susan Elizabeth Phillips' This Heart of Mine or The Great Escape

**Inspirational Fiction:**

* Karen Kingsbury's Above the Line series or The Bridge
* Beth Moore's So Long, Insecurity or To Live is Christ
* Francine Rivers' Mark of the Lion series or The Atonement Child

Consider your grandma's interests, hobbies, or favorite genres when choosing books. You can also ask her friends or family members for recommendations. If you're still unsure, you could opt for a gift card to her favorite bookstore or online retailer, so she can pick out her own books.

Remember, the thought and love behind your gift are what truly matter. Your grandma will appreciate the effort you put into selecting books that resonate with her tastes.
